name: @flair-sdk/contracts
description: A monorepo containing all evm-based smart contracts and extensions used on Flair platform.
author: flair.finance

scripts.compile: npm run compile-flair && npm run compile-openzeppelin
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npx hardhat coverage --temp artifacts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:expensive: npm run deploy:arbitrumOne && npm run deploy:mainnet
scripts.deploy:cheap: npm run deploy:polygon && npm run deploy:ropsten && npm run deploy:rinkeby && npm run deploy:goerli && npm run deploy:arbitrumTestnet && npm run deploy:opera && npm run deploy:ftmTestnet && npm run deploy:avalanche && npm run deploy:avalancheFujiTestnet && npm run deploy:okcMainnet && npm run deploy:sepolia
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:mainnet && npm run verify:polygon && npm run verify:ropsten && npm run verify:rinkeby && npm run verify:goerli && npm run verify:arbitrumOne && npm run verify:arbitrumTestnet && npm run verify:opera && npm run verify:ftmTestnet && npm run verify:avalanche && npm run verify:avalancheFujiTestnet && npm run verify:sepolia
scripts.verify:mainnet: npx hardhat --network mainnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network mainnet
scripts.verify:ropsten: npx hardhat --network ropsten sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network ropsten
scripts.verify:rinkeby: npx hardhat --network rinkeby sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network rinkeby
scripts.verify:goerli: npx hardhat --network goerli sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network goerli
scripts.verify:sepolia: npx hardhat --network sepolia sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network sepolia
scripts.verify:opera: npx hardhat --network opera sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network opera
scripts.verify:ftmTestnet: npx hardhat --network ftmTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network ftmTestnet
scripts.verify:avalanche: npx hardhat --network avalanche sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network avalanche
scripts.verify:avalancheFujiTestnet: npx hardhat --network avalancheFujiTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network avalancheFujiTestnet
scripts.verify:arbitrumOne: npx hardhat --network arbitrumOne sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network arbitrumOne
scripts.verify:arbitrumTestnet: npx hardhat --network arbitrumTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network arbitrumTestnet
scripts.verify:polygon: npx hardhat --network polygon sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network polygon
scripts.verify:polygonMumbai: npx hardhat --network polygonMumbai sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network polygonMumbai
scripts.verify:okcMainnet: npx hardhat --network okcMainnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network okcMainnet
scripts.verify:okcTestnet: npx hardhat --network okcTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network okcTestnet
scripts.verify:evmosMainnet: npx hardhat --network evmosMainnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network evmosMainnet
scripts.verify:evmosTestnet: npx hardhat --network evmosTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network evmosTestnet
scripts.verify:bsc: npx hardhat --network bsc sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network bsc
scripts.verify:bscTestnet: npx hardhat --network bscTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network bscTestnet
scripts.verify:zksyncTestnet: npx hardhat --network zksyncTestnet sourcify & npx hardhat etherscan-verify --network zksyncTestnet
